name: Jorge Gonçalves 0001
content: Jorge Goncalves – Associate Professor in Human-Computer Interaction @ University of Melbourne Skip to content Find an up-to-date CV here I am an Associate Professor at the University of Melbourne where I am part of the Human-Computer Interaction Group. Previously, I worked at the University of Oulu in the Center for Ubiquitous Computing. I received a PhD with distinction (2015) in Computer Science and Engineering from the University of Oulu, and a BSc (2009) / MSc (2011) in Computer Science and Engineering from the Madeira Interactive Technologies Institute, University of Madeira (Portugal) under the Carnegie Mellon University | Portugal partnership. Research interests include: Ubiquitous computing, HCI, crowdsourcing, social computing, Human-Centred AI, mixed reality. I am currently looking for PhD students in the areas of Human-Computer Interaction, Social Computing and Ubiquitous Computing. Feel free to contact me to discuss further details. Contact: jorge.goncalves [at] unimelb.edu.au Iconic One Theme | Powered by Wordpress
